analysis.description:
Drainable.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/33/0x67c9232f2f449f7acd4dd784cc1f20395af5baae.sol#114-126) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,bal) (/unique_chucks/33/0x67c9232f2f449f7acd4dd784cc1f20395af5baae.sol#122-126)
